definition: tender and soft as water/deeply attached to sb

sentences.english: I loved you tenderness and candor.
sentences.chinese: 我曾柔情似水滿懷真摯地愛過你。

sentences.english: The cardigans and leggings as soft as silk endow ladies with particular charm.
sentences.chinese: 柔情似水的毛衣裙裝賦予女性獨特的魅力。

sentences.english: Perhaps the city's too fast, so even the less love the original gentle enough.
sentences.chinese: 也許城市的太快了，所以即便的少愛原來的柔情似水。

sentences.english: A wave of sentiment swept over her.
sentences.chinese: 一陣柔情像水浪一樣淹沒了她。

sentences.english: Although your hairs have become gray, your softness and sentiment are still in my mind.
sentences.chinese: 雖然你已見白髮，但你的似水柔情依然在我心中。

sentences.english: Li's pock-marked wife was also waiting for him in a subdued, humble way.
sentences.chinese: 李的麻臉妻子也在柔情滿懷地等待着他。

sentences.english: It sounded both familiar and exotic, feminine yet strong.
sentences.chinese: 聽來情切又不失異國風情，柔情似水又堅強有力。

sentences.english: Mellowness ear, tenderness elegant, giving a comfortable feeling.
sentences.chinese: 清醇入耳，柔情優雅，給人舒服的感覺。

sentences.english: Hope not for mind in women ; at their best.
sentences.chinese: 別在女人身上找心靈，縱有柔情蜜意。

sentences.english: I made shoulder strong enough to carry the weight of the world. Yet, gentle enough to give comfort.
sentences.chinese: 我使她的肩膀能挑起整個世界的重擔，並且柔情似水。

sentences.english: The picture has aroused all the tender feelings in me and softened the grimness that is all around.
sentences.chinese: 照片激起我心中的萬般柔情，撫慰這周遭一切的冷酷。

sentences.english: I made her shoulders strong enough to carry the weight of the world; yet , gentle enough to give comfort.
sentences.chinese: 我使她的肩膀能挑起整個世界的重擔，並且柔情似水。
薩姆就是這樣的柔情蜜意。
是你的萬種柔情融化冰雪。

sentences.english: People usually think Chinese women are always gentle.
sentences.chinese: 人們通常認爲中國女性總是柔情似水。

sentences.english: As a woman, she is as sweet as honey too.
sentences.chinese: 作爲女人，她也有情意纏綿，柔情似水的一面。

definition: tender and soft as water/deeply attached to sb
in love with/to feel deeply attached to
